metadata.title: CVE-2022-3287 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: When creating an OPERATOR user account on the BMC, the redfish plugin saved the auto-generated password to /etc/fwupd/redfish.conf without proper restriction, allowing any user on the system to read the same configuration file.

criterions.comment: fwupd package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
